          <description>
            <string language="sl">Naboj prečka električno polje, ki ga ustvarjata ravnini naspotno nabitih delcev.</string>
            <string language="en">A charge is crossing the field between two planes of opposite charges.</string>
          </description>

            <string language="x-mt-de">Eine Ladung kreuzt auffangene zwischen zwei 
Flächen der gegenüberliegenden Ladungen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Une charge croise la zone entre deux plans des 
frais opposés.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Uma carga está cruzando o campo entre dois planos

          </description>

            <string language="x-mt-it">Una carica sta attraversando il campo fra due 
piani delle spese opposte.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μια δαπάνη διασχίζει το πεδίο μεταξύ δύο αεροπλάνων 
των αντίθετων δαπανών.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Una carga está cruzando el campo entre dos planos
de cargas opuestas.</string>
